title: Strictly Come Dancing: week six – live
summary: The Halloween Spooktacular features an eclectic mix of creepy soundtracks from artists like Nick Cave and Beethoven, alongside unexpected tunes. Audiences are left wondering which performances will delight them and which will disappoint. The event promises a fun blend of treats and tricks.

title: Liverpool v Aston Villa: Premier League – live
summary: The champions are in urgent need of a victory as they prepare to face a challenging match against Aston Villa. A minute-by-minute report will be provided by Rob Smyth during the game. The stakes are high as the team's performance is critical for their season.

title: Ireland v New Zealand: rugby union Test – live
summary: The Irish aim to replicate their 2016 victory at Soldier Field in an anticipated match. A minute-by-minute report by Daniel Gallan will provide live updates. Fans are eager to see if the team can secure another impressive win.

title: Tottenham 0-1 Chelsea: Premier League – live reaction
summary: João Pedro scored the only goal of the match, leading Chelsea to a victory over Tottenham Hotspur. Spurs struggled throughout the game and were fortunate not to concede further goals. Their disappointing performance drew boos from their home fans.

title: Breeders’ Cup 2025 horse racing: day two – live
summary: Greg Wood will provide updates on nine upcoming races, including key insights and analysis for the Breeders' Cup Classic. The coverage aims to inform fans about the latest developments in these important events. The updates promise to enhance the viewing experience for racing enthusiasts.
